it.title: Contenuto sintetico
it.prompt: Summarize the following text into 100 words, making it easy to read and comprehend. The summary should be concise, clear, and capture the main points of the text. Avoid using complex sentence structures or technical jargon. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Italian. Please begin by editing the following text:
it.description: Riassumete il seguente testo in 100 parole in modo che sia facile da leggere e da capire. Evitate strutture di frase complesse o termini tecnici.
